security: Disclosure of the subject's true employment, especially in sensitive roles, could jeopardize ongoing operations. Quoting: 'SUBJECT WILL BE DENIED FOR ENTIRE PERIOD OF EMPLOYMENT EXCEPT FOR U.S. GOVERNMENT EMPLOYMENT APPLICATIONS.'
summary: This document notifies the establishment of official cover for David S. Grales, associated with a U.S. Army Staff Group, to block records and conceal his employment, with specific instructions regarding employment verification limitations.
summary_one_paragraph: A notification, dated September 18, 1975, from the Chief of the Control Division, OP, to the Chief of the Contract Personnel Division, OP, regarding the establishment of official cover for David S. Grales, associated with the U.S. Army Staff Group, with SS number 525-23-4565 and employee number 063385. The notification specifies the blocking of records to conceal Grales's employment, with limitations on confirming this employment except for U.S. Government employment applications. The document includes instructions for submitting various forms related to W-2 issuance, hospitalization cards, and any changes affecting the cover.
title: Notification of Establishment or Cancellation of Official Cover Backstop
